title: Phase 4: E2E encryption implementation
description:
Implement end-to-end encryption for relay messages

Encryption scheme:
- Key exchange: X25519 Diffie-Hellman during pairing
- Encryption: ChaCha20-Poly1305 (AEAD)
- Key derivation: HKDF-SHA256 with salt 'wynter-relay-v1'
- Nonce: 24 random bytes per message

Tasks:
- Desktop: Implement in relay_client.rs using x25519-dalek + chacha20poly1305 crates
- Mobile: Implement in relayCrypto.ts using expo-crypto
- Key exchange during pairing (pubkey in QR code)
- Key storage: desktop ~/.wynter-code/.relay_keys.json, mobile Expo SecureStore
- Key rotation every 7 days (optional)
- Encrypted envelope format: sender_id, recipient_id, timestamp, nonce, ciphertext
close_reason: Implemented E2E encryption for relay: Desktop now uses XChaCha20Poly1305 (24-byte nonces) matching mobile; Added PeerConnected message type for dynamic key exchange; Mobile sends public key in handshake; Both sides derive shared key via X25519 DH + HKDF-SHA256

title: Fix Farmwork Tycoon vehicle returning after task completion - should stay off screen
description: In Farmwork Tycoon game, vehicles are incorrectly returning to view after completing their tasks and moving off screen. Expected behavior: once a vehicle completes its task and exits the screen, it should remain off screen and be removed from the game state. Current behavior: vehicles are coming back into view. Need to investigate the vehicle lifecycle logic and fix the disposal/cleanup of completed vehicles.
close_reason: Fixed by preserving task and currentRouteIndex in VehicleSprite.updateData() - prevents store sync from overwriting exiting status
